modName: Vampire Armor UNP (Mini Vamps UNP - Standalone) CBBE Vanilla Support
summary:
This mod is a simple standalone conversion of HHaleyy - Mini Vamps UNP mod.

Works well with UNP and Vanilla (Only females).
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Tahoma]This mod is a simple standalone conversion of HHaleyy "Mini Vamps UNP" mod.[/font]
[font=Tahoma]All Armour have been repaint/re-textured (true 2K) in this version. *except for the boots/gloves (1K)[/font]

[font=Tahoma]This is a Standalone Armour, All items are craftable at a Forge (Leather Armor), cost 1 Leather to craft.[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Works well with UNP and Vanilla (Only females).[/font]


[font=Courier New][color=#d9d2e9][b]Ａpparel Name　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Enchantment effects[/b][/color][/font]
[color=#d9ead3][font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｒｅｄ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　　　　　　○[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｔｈｉｅｖｅｓ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　　[/font][font=Tahoma]○[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｗｈｉｔｅ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　　　　[/font][font=Tahoma]○[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｅｌｖｅｎ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　　　　[/font][font=Tahoma]○[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｂｌａｃｋ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　　　　[/font][font=Tahoma]○[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Ｖａｍｐｉｒｅ　Ｒｏｙａｌ　Ｖａｌｅｒｉｃａ　Ａｒｍｏｒ　　　　　　[/font][font=Tahoma]○[/font]

[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]REQUIREMENT[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/211720/]Dawnguard DLC[/url]


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]INSTALLING / UPDATES[/size][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43741/?]Mini Vamps UNP[/url][font=Tahoma]([/font]Vampire Armor [font=Tahoma]Replacer) | Vampire Armor UNP(Standalone) [/font][color=#ff0000]Only choose one of the above.[/color]

[font=Tahoma]NMM: Download/install[/font]
[font=Tahoma]or[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Manually: Extract the files, Copy its contents to your ..Skyrim\Data folder and click "yes" to overwrite folders.[/font]


[font=Georgia][color=#dd7e6b][size=4]FUTURE PLANS[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Tahoma]Improve meshes[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Optimization GND[/font]
[font=Tahoma]Renamed for better sorting[/font]

[font=Tahoma]---[/font]
[size=2][color=#ffe599]I hope you like the result! Feel free to drop by in the comments section if you have any issues or would like to give feedback.
And upload pictures to the gallery, I'd love to see how they look in your games.[/color]

[color=#fff2cc]If you want to use my textures in your mod and want to release the mod somewhere, credit me then notify me of your mod after the release.[/color][/size][color=#fff2cc]

[font=Tahoma]*ENG is not my first language.[/font][/color]
